text:
Police have recovered Rs. 30 lakh-worth copper cables from a godown here. When a group of ‘Q’ Branch police personnel raided a godown at Caldwell Colony on Thursday following information about stocking of sea cucumber, they found Rs. 30 lakh-worth copper cables, electrical accessories and iron pipes lying there. During investigation, police reportedly found that the cables had been stolen from a power plant.

Subsequently, they informed the ASP of Thoothukudi, Arun Sakthikumar and the Thermal Nagar police, who had registered a case in this connection on May 5, 2015.

Police have picked up three persons for interrogation.
title: Copper cables recovered
